name.en: Special Course on Seismic Studies on Atmospheric, Hydrospheric, and Lithospheric Processes
name.ch: 利用地震資料研究大氣 海洋及岩石圈特論

department.en: International Ph.D. Graduate Program for Earth System Science
department.ch: 地球系統科學國際研究生博士學位學程

remark.en: 1.)Classroom：Room 511, 5th floor, Institute of Earth Sciences, Academia Sinica., 2.)TIGP students only
remark.ch: 1.上課地點：中研院地球所511室 2.限TIGP學生

goal.en: Develop the student’s ability to process digital data and interpret processes on our earth.
goal.ch: 發展學生數值資料處理能力，以及解釋地球各種作用。

content.en: 1. Introduction 2. Seismic data analysis 3. Discrete spectral analysis 4. Filters 5. Deconvolution 6. Migration 7. Seismic velocity analysis 8. Data fitting and model inversion
content.ch: 1.前言 2.震測資料分析 3.離散頻譜分析 4.濾波 5.解迴旋 6.移位 7.速度分析 8.逆推

method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗

en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance ， Products/Creative Performance

en.competency: Advanced mathematical and professional knowledge and ability
en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance

en.competency: Observation simulation and analysis of reasoning ability
International perspective and language communication skills
